PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-13312012-10-04,  ,  ,  EC,  HC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA), in order to enable the Ministers to develop risk management instruments under CEPA 1999 to manage human health risks posed by these following four substances : VANADIUM PENTOXIDE, POTASSIUM BROMATE, TGOPE AND METHYL EUGENOL.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0219 Publication Date: 2012-10-24
AttachmentsAttachment
